chapter.title: Quickstart with Vagrant
chapter.para: This section describes the steps required to deploy a whole cluster on a single machine using git, vagrant, and chef.

sect1.title: Pre-requisites:
sect1.para:
You should have the following programs installed: git, vagrant. You will also need to download the vagrant virtual machine image for Ubuntu 12.04 "precise".
apt-get install git-core vagrant vagrant box add "precise64" http://files.vagrantup.com/precise64.box

sect1.title: Launching Vagrant
sect1.para: You now need to clone our chef recipes, and then launch a vagrant instance.

informalexample.programlisting: git clone https://github.com/hopstart/hop-chef.git cd hop-chef vagrant up
